sun.anulunar_wisdom: Your inner sun is the cosmic flame that AnuLunar knew burns within every soul - let it illuminate your authentic path

aries.core_essence: The Cosmic Pioneer - first to charge into new spiritual territories
aries.spiritual_gift: Initiating sacred action with divine courage
aries.shadow_work: Learning patience in the cosmic timing of manifestation
aries.lunar_integration: Your fire needs moon wisdom to burn with sustainable passion
aries.anulunar_guidance: Channel your pioneering spirit into spiritual leadership that lights the way for others

taurus.core_essence: The Sacred Garden Keeper - grounding heaven into earth
taurus.spiritual_gift: Manifesting spiritual abundance through divine patience
taurus.shadow_work: Releasing attachment to material security over soul growth
taurus.lunar_integration: Moon cycles teach you the sacred rhythm of creation and rest
taurus.anulunar_guidance: Your steady presence creates fertile ground where spiritual dreams take root

gemini.core_essence: The Cosmic Messenger - bridging dimensions through communication
gemini.spiritual_gift: Translating divine downloads into accessible wisdom
gemini.shadow_work: Integrating scattered insights into coherent spiritual truth
gemini.lunar_integration: Lunar phases mirror your natural cycles of receiving and sharing
gemini.anulunar_guidance: Your quick mind is designed to decode cosmic messages and share them joyfully

cancer.core_essence: The Moon Child - intuitive guardian of emotional wisdom
cancer.spiritual_gift: Nurturing others' spiritual awakening through empathic understanding
cancer.shadow_work: Balancing emotional sensitivity with energetic boundaries
cancer.lunar_integration: You ARE the moon's representative - deeply connected to her cycles
cancer.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional depth is a sacred well of healing for yourself and others

leo.core_essence: The Divine Creative - radiating soul-centered creative fire
leo.spiritual_gift: Inspiring others through authentic self-expression and spiritual confidence
leo.shadow_work: Distinguishing ego-driven attention from soul-centered service
leo.lunar_integration: New moons amplify your creative visions, full moons illuminate your gifts
leo.anulunar_guidance: Your natural radiance is meant to illuminate spiritual possibilities for others

virgo.core_essence: The Sacred Perfectionist - refining matter through spiritual service
virgo.spiritual_gift: Organizing chaos into divine order through practical wisdom
virgo.shadow_work: Releasing perfectionism that blocks spiritual progress and self-acceptance
virgo.lunar_integration: Waning moons support your natural inclination to purify and release
virgo.anulunar_guidance: Your attention to detail helps create sacred containers for spiritual growth

libra.core_essence: The Harmony Weaver - balancing opposites into divine unity
libra.spiritual_gift: Creating beauty and peace that elevates consciousness
libra.shadow_work: Finding your authentic center rather than constantly adapting to others
libra.lunar_integration: Libra season full moon teaches perfect balance between light and shadow
libra.anulunar_guidance: Your gift for harmony helps others find the middle way in their spiritual journey

scorpio.core_essence: The Soul Transformer - diving deep into hidden spiritual truths
scorpio.spiritual_gift: Facilitating profound healing and regeneration through fearless truth
scorpio.shadow_work: Transforming the need to control into trust in divine mystery
scorpio.lunar_integration: Dark moon phases are your power time for deep spiritual work
scorpio.anulunar_guidance: Your intensity is a sacred tool for helping others face their shadows with courage

sagittarius.core_essence: The Cosmic Explorer - seeking ultimate truth and meaning
sagittarius.spiritual_gift: Inspiring others to expand their spiritual horizons through joyful wisdom
sagittarius.shadow_work: Grounding expansive visions into practical spiritual application
sagittarius.lunar_integration: Waxing moons fuel your quest for higher knowledge and understanding
sagittarius.anulunar_guidance: Your enthusiasm for truth creates infectious inspiration for spiritual adventure

capricorn.core_essence: The Spiritual Master Builder - creating lasting structures for divine work
capricorn.spiritual_gift: Manifesting spiritual goals through disciplined, methodical effort
capricorn.shadow_work: Releasing the need to achieve spiritual status through external validation
capricorn.lunar_integration: Winter solstice energy mirrors your ability to find light in darkness
capricorn.anulunar_guidance: Your natural authority helps establish spiritual practices that endure

aquarius.core_essence: The Cosmic Innovator - channeling future spiritual technologies
aquarius.spiritual_gift: Revolutionizing spiritual understanding through unique perspective
aquarius.shadow_work: Balancing detachment with heartfelt connection to humanity
aquarius.lunar_integration: New moon in Aquarius activates your ability to download future wisdom
aquarius.anulunar_guidance: Your unconventional insights help birth new paradigms of spiritual understanding

pisces.core_essence: The Cosmic Mystic - dissolving boundaries between spirit and matter
pisces.spiritual_gift: Channeling divine compassion and universal love
pisces.shadow_work: Maintaining spiritual boundaries while staying open to universal flow
pisces.lunar_integration: Full moon in Pisces opens the veils between dimensions for deep communion
pisces.anulunar_guidance: Your natural mysticism creates bridges between the seen and unseen worlds

by_house.1: Your spiritual identity and how you present your divine self to the world
by_house.2: Your soul's relationship to material resources and self-worth
by_house.3: How you communicate spiritual insights and connect with divine messages
by_house.4: Your spiritual foundation and connection to ancestral wisdom
by_house.5: Creative expression of your divine nature and spiritual joy
by_house.6: Daily spiritual practice and service to the collective
by_house.7: Spiritual partnerships and what you seek in divine union
by_house.8: Deep transformation and access to hidden spiritual resources
by_house.9: Your spiritual philosophy and connection to higher learning
by_house.10: Your spiritual mission and how you serve the world
by_house.11: Your spiritual community and future-focused visions
by_house.12: Your connection to the collective unconscious and divine surrender

moon.archetype: The Divine Feminine & Emotional Wisdom Keeper
moon.anulunar_wisdom: The moon holds all our tears and all our dreams - she teaches us that both are sacred

aries.core_essence: The Warrior Heart - emotional courage and passionate instincts
aries.emotional_nature: Quick to feel, quick to act, needs immediate emotional expression
aries.intuitive_gifts: Lightning-fast emotional intelligence and crisis response
aries.shadow_patterns: Emotional reactivity and impatience with others' processing speed
aries.lunar_integration: New moon rituals help channel emotional fire into positive action
aries.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional directness helps others access their authentic feelings

taurus.core_essence: The Sacred Grove - steady emotional presence and earthly wisdom
taurus.emotional_nature: Slow to stir but deep in feeling, needs security and comfort
taurus.intuitive_gifts: Sensing what others need for emotional stability and healing
taurus.shadow_patterns: Emotional stubbornness and resistance to necessary change
taurus.lunar_integration: Full moon ceremonies in nature amplify your earthy wisdom
taurus.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional steadiness creates safe space for others to feel deeply

mercury.anulunar_wisdom: Mercury helps us translate the language of the cosmos into words the heart understands

venus.anulunar_wisdom: Venus reminds us that love is not just an emotion - it's a creative force that shapes reality

mars.anulunar_wisdom: Mars teaches us that spiritual action requires both divine fire and earthly courage

jupiter.anulunar_wisdom: Jupiter shows us that true abundance flows when we share our gifts with generous hearts

saturn.anulunar_wisdom: Saturn's lessons are love letters from the universe, teaching us to build spiritual strength

uranus.anulunar_wisdom: Uranus shakes us awake to remember we came here to change the world with our uniqueness

neptune.anulunar_wisdom: Neptune dissolves the boundaries between what is and what could be, revealing infinite possibilities

pluto.anulunar_wisdom: Pluto's gift is showing us that what we fear to lose was never truly ours - only love remains
